questions.text: Which database management system (DBMS) do you currently use most frequently? (e.g., MySQL, PostgreSQL, Oracle SQL Server, MongoDB)?
What is your favorite programming language?
How frequently do you utilize APIs in your back-end development projects?
Beyond core languages (e.g., Python, Java), which back-end frameworks or tools do you find most valuable in your workflow, and why?
When faced with a complex back-end problem, how do you approach the debugging and troubleshooting process?
In your experience, what are the most effective strategies for designing and implementing scalable and maintainable back-end systems?
Security is paramount in back-end development. How do you stay informed about the latest security threats and best practices to mitigate them in your applications?
